article: One day Tom bought , for two dollars , a large number of second-hand books . He put them in a _ and pulled them to the office . He had to remain at work _ three in the morning . At three , he began to walk home . The streets were dark . Tom could _ wait to arrive home to begin reading his new books . " _ ! " a voice shouted . But Tom was too _ to hear the shout . A moment later , a gunshot went _ his ear . He heard the shot . Tom turned to see what was _ . An angry policeman ran towards him . The policeman didn't _ that the bag was Tom's . He shouted at Tom , " _ it !" "Open it ! " the policeman _ . Tom opened it and the old books fell out of it . "Why did you not stop _ when I shouted ?" the policeman asked , "If I could shoot _ , you would be dead ." "I didn't _ you , " Tom said , " I am almost deaf . " The policeman told Tom he was _ for having shot at him . " _ would be better for you not to walk on the _ at night . " he said . Tom smiled , and told the policeman that his job _ a clerk in the telegraph office was a _ job . The policeman could think of _ to answer this .
